What is the full model name?

What are some studies or notable projects that have used the model?
Is there a preferred citation for referencing the use of this model?

When was the model first developed?

What was the original purpose or objective of the model? Why was it built?
What is this model known for? What topical area(s) is it especially useful for?
Describe the model concept
Describe the reasoning for hybrid classification.
How does the model treat market equilibrium?
Picklist options (Data Entry): general; non-equilibrium (systems dynamics); partial; not specified

Definition/ Input Explanation: Is all future information known by agents at the beginning of the model run, or updated at each time step?
Picklist options (Data Entry): extrapolation of present state; fully dynamic; limited; myopic; perfect; recursive dynamic; static
